title: Emmerdale spoilers: Kim to seek revenge after Jamie discovers Graham and Rhona's secret?
text:
Graham Foster (Andrew Scarborough) has been much more secretive than usual in Emmerdale as of late — something which has piqued Kim Tate’s (Claire King) interest. The thought of Graham being in a relationship has undoubtedly made the Home Farm businesswoman jealous, so — with Jamie (Alexander Lincoln) having discovered that Graham’s other woman is none other than Rhona Goskirk (Zoe Henry) tonight — could Kim set about seeking revenge as a result?

With Graham having developed a relationship with Rhona, his priorities have understandably been elsewhere as of late. However, this is something that Kim has picked up on, and thus she’s made it her mission to try and find out why her business partner has been so distant with her. She believes that Graham is seeing another woman — and she discussed this with Jamie in tonight’s episode.

Jamie begged Kim to be honest, and — in spite of some initial backtracking — she eventually admitted that she is jealous of this mystery woman, and that she’d hoped a relationship between her and Graham might’ve been a possibility one day.

Jamie was shocked by his mum’s honesty, having never seen her speak so openly about her feelings before. However, he later made a shocking discovery when — sitting in his car outside the veterinary practice — he spotted a loved-up Graham arriving at Rhona’s, before the two lovers shared a kiss.

Jamie was noticeably shocked, and he’s no doubt going to be conflicted about what to do for the best. After the heart-to-heart with his mum, will he feel compelled to reveal what he knows?

It’s certainly a possibility, but then again, Jamie’s got a good relationship with Rhona himself, and informing Kim about what he saw could jeopardise said relationship — not to mention his working environment considering he works at the vets.

However, there’s a much more important question here, and that’s: if Kim does discover the truth — will she seek revenge?

Kim and Rhona were friends once, but a lot has happened since then, and there’s a lot of animosity between them now, so Kim will no doubt feel angry should she learn Rhona is the other woman.

Seeking revenge on Rhona is one thing, but could she also perhaps seek revenge on Graham? She’ll no doubt feel betrayed by Graham for entering into a relationship with one of her adversaries.

Hell hath no fury like Kim Tate.

Emmerdale continues Thursday 31stOctober at 7pm on ITV.
